so heres another question, do you know "whos who" in your group? the liars and truth speakers? and if so, then maybe you could tell them to stop lying to you and dont take any inforamation from the liar in the group. Sounds like he/she is a trouble maker and just feeding you crap. what are all the differnt spirits? and thier positions? like i hear spirits ghosts demons shadow people and on and on, maybe you have a little demon in there trying to cause havoc in your life that you need to get rid of?
   
  amy
